S04sukhvysu:5: bhikṣuśatair abhijñānābhijñātaiḥ sthavirair mahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ /
S04sukhvysu:6: tadyathā sthavireṇa ca śāriputreṇa mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena
S04sukhvysu:7: ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
S04sukhvysu:8: ca revatena ca śuddhipaṃthakena ca naṃdena cānaṃdena ca rāhulena ca
S04sukhvysu:9: gavāṃpatinā ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena cāniruddhena
S04sukhvysu:10: ca / etaiś cānyaiś ca saṃbahulair mahāśrāvakaiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisattvair
S04sukhvysu:13: bodhisattvena gaṃdhahastinā ca bodhisattvena nityodyuktena ca
S04sukhvysu:18: śakreṇa ca devānām iṃdreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā /
S04sukhvysu:21: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram āmaṃtrayati sma / asti
S04sukhvysu:22: śāriputra paścime digbhāga ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhakṣetrāṇām
S04sukhvysu:25: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:26: deśayati / tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ
S04sukhvysu:28: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau
S04sukhvysu:29: nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkhaṃ apramāṇāny eva sukhakāraṇāni /
S04sukhvysu:30: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatīty ucyate //2//
S04sukhvysu:31: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhir vedikābhiḥ
S04sukhvysu:32: saptabhis tālapaṃktibhiḥ kiṃkiṇījālaiś ca samalaṃkṛtā samaṃtato 'nuparikṣiptā
S04sukhvysu:38: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ /
S04sukhvysu:39: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohita-
S04sukhvysu:44: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samaṃtāc caturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi
S04sukhvysu:48: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samaṃtād ratnavṛkṣā jātāś citrā
S04sukhvysu:53: ratnasya / tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu saṃti padmāni jātāni nīlāni
S04sukhvysu:62: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni
S04sukhvysu:65: triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ
S04sukhvysu:67: tatra ye sattvā upapannās ta ekena purobhaktena
S04sukhvysu:68: koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vaṃdaṃty anyāṃl lokadhātūn gatvā / ekaikaṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:69: tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhir abhyavakīrya punar api
S04sukhvysu:73: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre saṃti haṃsāḥ kraiṃcā mayūrāś ca /
S04sukhvysu:74: te triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvaṃti
S04sukhvysu:79: śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate dharmamanasikāra utpadyate saṃghamanasikāra
S04sukhvysu:80: utpadyate // tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra tiryagyonigatās te
S04sukhvysu:85: tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti tiryagyonīnāṃ yamalokasya
S04sukhvysu:86: nāsti / te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghās tenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā
S04sukhvysu:90: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:91: kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04sukhvysu:92: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṃgikasya divyasya tūryasya
S04sukhvysu:93: cāryaiḥ(2) saṃpravāditasya valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati evam eva
S04sukhvysu:94: śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ
S04sukhvysu:97: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati dharmānusmṛtiḥ kāye
S04sukhvysu:101: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur nāmocyate /
S04sukhvysu:102: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām(3)
S04sukhvysu:105: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ
S04sukhvysu:107: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho
S04sukhvysu:108: nāmocyate / tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhāpratihatā
S04sukhvysu:112: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ
S04sukhvysu:117: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā
S04sukhvysu:119: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇam ākhyātum
S04sukhvysu:128: śāriputra kuśalamūlenāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyaṃte /
S04sukhvysu:129: yaḥ kaścic chāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya
S04sukhvysu:130: bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati śrutvā ca manasikariṣyati
S04sukhvysu:131: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā
S04sukhvysu:132: paṃcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati
S04sukhvysu:133: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati tasya kālaṃ
S04sukhvysu:135: purataḥ sthāsyati so 'viparyastacittaḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati ca(4) /
S04sukhvysu:136: sa kālaṃ krtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:138: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra idam arthavaśam saṃpaśyamāna
S04sukhvysu:139: evaṃ vadāmi satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre
S04sukhvysu:141: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra aham etarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi evam eva
S04sukhvysu:143: śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśy akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma
S04sukhvysu:144: tathāgato mahāmerur nāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:145: maṃjudhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi
S04sukhvysu:151: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi caṃdrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho
S04sukhvysu:152: nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma
S04sukhvysu:153: tathāgato 'naṃtavīryo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:157: yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ //12//
S04sukhvysu:159: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśy amitāyur nāma tathāgato 'mitaskaṃdho nāma
S04sukhvysu:160: tathāgato 'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:161: mahāratnaketur nāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ
S04sukhvysu:168: evam uttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo
S04sukhvysu:171: duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgata ādityasaṃbhavo nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho
S04sukhvysu:172: nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhā(5)
S04sukhvysu:176: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
S04sukhvysu:178: evam adhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:179: yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nama tathāgato dharmadharo
S04sukhvysu:180: nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputrādhastāyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:183: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
S04sukhvysu:185: evam upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo
S04sukhvysu:186: nāma tathāgata iṃdraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gaṃdhottamo nama
S04sukhvysu:187: tathāgato gaṃdhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:189: tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśo nāma tathāgataḥ
S04sukhvysu:190: sumerukalpo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputropariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi
S04sukhvysu:196: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho
S04sukhvysu:197: nāmocyate / ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S04sukhvysu:198: vāsya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyaṃti teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S04sukhvysu:199: nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyaṃty avinivartanīyāś
S04sukhvysu:202: śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mākāṃkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ /
S04sukhvysu:204: ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya
S04sukhvysu:206: kṛtaṃ vā kurvaṃti vā sarve te 'vinivartanīyā bhaviṣyaṃty anuttarāyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:208: tatra ca buddhakṣetra upapatsyaṃty upapannā vopapadyaṃti vā /
S04sukhvysu:210: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tatra buddhakṣetre
S04sukhvysu:212: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputrāham etarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
S04sukhvysu:214: parikīrtayāmi evam eva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā
S04sukhvysu:221: tan mamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yan mayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv
S04sukhvysu:223: deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye //19//
S04sukhvysu:228: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaṃdharvaś ca loko bhagavato
